void comm_send_pluginlist ( struct arglist *  globals  ) 

Sends the list of plugins that the scanner could load to the client,.

using the OTP format (calls send_plug_info for each).

Parameters:
globals The global arglist.
See also:

void comm_setup_plugins ( struct arglist *  globals,
char *  list 
)

Enable the plugins which have been selected by the user, or all if list == NULL or list == "-1;";

Parameters:
globals The Global context to retrieve plugins from.
list A user (client) defined semicolon delimited list, of plugin(oids) that shall be enabled. If NULL or "-1;" all plugins are enabled!

void comm_wait_order ( struct arglist *  globals  ) 

This function waits for the attack order of the client. Meanwhile, it processes all the messages the client could send.
